Package atk.util

Class ColorGradient

java.lang.Object
atk.util.ColorGradient
public class ColorGradient extends Object
This class provides a method of creating a smooth gradient evenly distributed colour points. To create a gradient, add as many colors as you like and call createGradient. getColour or getGradient can be used to retrieve the resultant colors.
Author:
Thomas Abeel

  • Method Details

    • addPoint

      public void addPoint(Color gradientColour)
      Add a color to the gradient list.
      Parameters:
      gradientColour - the next color in the gradient.

    • createGradient

      public void createGradient()
      Create the gradient using the current gradient list. This method defaults to using 256 steps.

    • createGradient

      public void createGradient(int numSteps)
      Create the gradient using the current gradient list.
      Parameters:
      numSteps - the total number of steps to take from the first color to the last.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor(int i)
      Return the ith colour in the gradient.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of gradient array to return.
      Returns:
      the Color value in the gradient.

    • getGradient

      public List<Color> getGradient()
      Return the entire gradient as a Color list.
      Returns:
      list containing the gradient colors.

      Test function.
